EmailTemplate.name: 18-BG TO-CloudBand-Email-Thanks you email-T00212.Email 03
EmailTemplate.subject: Open Networking Summit - Let’s Continue the Conversation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> It was great meeting you in Los Angeles! Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir / Madam}},
It was great meeting you recently at the ONS event in Los Angeles and demonstrating our latest advances in cloud operations. We hope you had a great and useful time and had the opportunity learn more about our Cloud solutions and our commitment to open source projects and communities.
Check out the OpenStack wikis to learn more:
- Keynote panel about SDN/NFV deployment progress <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nc9GtJPw0wk&list=PLbzoR-pLrL6qRtjoA5vHbU2YDma56KNG9&index=5&t=0s]]>, Ron Haberman - Panel about OPNFV Verified program <[[https://onsna18.sched.com/event/Dm4P/panel-discussion-becoming-opnfv-verified-what-this-means-for-participants-and-the-nfv-ecosystem-moderated-by-ray-paik-the-linux-foundation?iframe=no&w=100%25&sidebar=yes&bg=no]]>, Tommy Lindgren - Open source as a platform for 5G network <[[https://onsna18.sched.com/event/Dm50/open-source-as-a-platform-for-5g-network-juha-oravainen-nokia?iframe=no&w=100%25&sidebar=yes&bg=no]]>, Juha Oravainen & Tapio Tallgren - Transition of a Telecom Vendor to the World of Open Source <[[https://onsna18.sched.com/event/E9uf/transition-of-a-telecom-vendor-to-the-world-of-open-source-jonne-soininen-nokia?iframe=yes&w=100%25&sidebar=yes&bg=no]]>, Jonne Soininen
For further information you can visit our Cloud website <[[https://networks.nokia.com/innovation/cloud?did=d000000000cj&utm_campaign=cloudband&utm_source=email-list-cloudpage&utm_medium=email]]> and if you would like to receive Cloud related marketing information in the future, please subscribe here <[[http://go.nokia.com/s0CI0Sc0jRUc0W026J30V0Z]]>.
Yours sincerely, The Nokia CloudBand team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
